titleStmt.title: Description of Columbia University. MS Or 298: Risālah dar hayʼat. Sharḥ-i Risālah dar hayʼat.

notesStmt.note: Title of first work from introduction to second work (f. [22v]) and title from second work from added title in later hand (f. [1r]).

msContents.summary: An astronomical treatise by al-Qūshjī and a commentary on it by Muṣliḥ al-Dīn al-Lārī, copied together. A leaf (f. [23]) may have been removed. In the commentary, source-text is overlined in red.

msItem.title: Risālah dar hayʼat. Sharḥ-i Risālah dar hayʼat.
رساله در هيئت. ]شرح رساله در هيئت[

author.persName: Muṣliḥ al-Dīn al-Lārī, Muḥammad ibn Ṣalāḥ, -1571 or 1572
مصلح الدين اللارى، محمد بن صلاح، 1571- يا 1572

supportDesc.extent: 85 foliated leaves : 200 x 130 (148 x 70) mm, bound to 201 x 130 mm

layoutDesc.layout: 27 lines with some marginalia. Opening page pricked and ruled in dry point.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Written in nastaʻlīq in black ink; pointed, unvocalized.

decoDesc.decoNote: Rubrications in red. Astronomical diagrams in red and black.
Owner's stamp and notation: al-Sayyid Muḥammad ʿAṭāʾ Allah

binding.p: Paper over pasteboard with flap. Marbed green and blue sides and flap with green patterned frame. Spine repaired in red textile.

origin.p: Item is undated. Likely copied in the 18th or 19th century.

history.provenance: Formerly owned by George Arthur Plimpton (bookplate inside front cover).
